title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 255 - Transmission And Distribution Of Gas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 255 - Transmission And Distribution Of Gas

State Regulations
§ 255.0 - Repealed

General (§ 255.1 to 255.46)

Materials (§ 255.51 to 255.96)

Pipe Design (§ 255.101 to 255.125)

Design of Pipeline Components (§ 255.141 to 255.193)

Overpressure Protection (§ 255.194 to 2555.204)

Welding of Steel in Pipelines (§ 255.221 to 255.245)

Joining of Materials Other Than by Welding (§ 255.271 to 255.287)

General Construction Requirements for Transmission Lines and Mains (§ 255.301 to 255.329)

Customer Meters, Service Regulators, and Service Lines (§ 255.351 to 255.385)

Requirements for Corrosion Control (§ 255.451 to 255.491)

Test Requirements (§ 255.501 to 255.517)

Upgrading/Conversion (§ 255.551 to 255.559)

Operations (§ 255.601 to 255.631)

Maintenance (§ 255.701 to 255.758)

Accidents and Leaks (§ 255.801 to 255.831)

Transmission Pipeline Integrity Management (§ 255.901 to 255.1015)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 255

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§
2[10], [11], 4, 64, 65, 66, 71, 72, 72-a, 75, 79, 210; Executive Law, §
101-a[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
